data.name: Seven Mortal Sins: Beach of Lust
data.short_description: Lucifer, Maria, and Levi head towards Miami in search of a Mortal Sin that Maria has detected. Lucifer is now weaker after her fight with the Sins and has decided to take on each Sin, one by one. Lucifer is calculating the best way to fight against the Demon Lord of Lust, but Levi wants to do things
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
